content.question: Once the selected works are published, they will

choices.label: become the property of the school
be displayed in the school store and cafeteria
be returned to the students who submitted them
become part of a museum exhibit

content.answer: become the property of the school

unit.text: 4: How Science and Technology Affect Our Lives

skill.text: Skill 4.A: Determine the meaning of familiar and unfamiliar words.
